item.description: A program to help identify and remediate dependency based attacks, and dependency confusion.

item.description: A fuzzer for binary programs taking simple plaintext, XML, JSON, & CSV input. Developed in Python.

item.description: A bill tracking, organisation, and payment solution for multiple users.

item.description: A simple packet capture program to passively analyse and capture network traffic.
